last_episode_to_air.name: America's Flying Saucer
last_episode_to_air.overview: America's new killer aircraft; out-of-this-world technology the U.S. military uses to conquer the globe.

name: Unsealed: Conspiracy Files
overview: We've all heard them ... the Mafia killed JFK, the government had a hand in 9/11 and the existence of aliens is the world's best-kept secret. Conspiracy theories are as old as mankind itself, and for just as long people have been taking sides. The advent of the internet provides a unique opportunity to level the playing field and give all men equal access to the facts. In April 2011, the FBI finally relented and established an online repository of files, documents and reports called "The Vault". Unsealed: Conspiracy Files is a ground breaking new show that shines a light on many of these archived case files.

seasons.name: Season 1
seasons.overview: We've all heard them ... the Mafia killed JFK, the government had a hand in 9/11 and the existence of aliens is the world's best-kept secret. Conspiracy theories are as old as mankind itself, and for just as long people have been taking sides. The advent of the internet provides a unique opportunity to level the playing field and give all men equal access to the facts. In April 2011, the FBI finally relented and established an online repository of files, documents and reports called "The Vault". Unsealed: Conspiracy Files is a ground breaking new show that shines a light on many of these archived case files.

episodes.name: Doomsday
episodes.overview: There have been doomsday signs and prophecies for centuries, and humans' time on this planet may be nearly over.

episodes.name: Bio-Hazard Island
episodes.overview: A secret government facility may have created many of the diseases currently plaguing the world.

episodes.name: Mind Control
episodes.overview: Those who wish to control what others think, how they act and what they believe; new practices in mind-control.

episodes.name: New World Order
episodes.overview: An elite group of power-brokers may be trying to rule the planet.

episodes.name: Zombies
episodes.overview: Zombies may be becoming a reality.

episodes.name: HAARP Around the World
episodes.overview: Governments around the world may be using weather control to incite the next world war and possibly destroy the planet.

episodes.name: Cloning
episodes.overview: Disturbing experiments in animal cloning go on behind closed doors, and human cloning may soon be a reality.

episodes.name: Bigfoot
episodes.overview: The evidence for Bigfoot piles up, causing some to wonder who has been keeping information from the public.

episodes.name: Who is the Antichrist?
episodes.overview: The Great Deceiver. Seducer of the masses. The Bringer of Armageddon. Every culture and religion on the planet believes that an evil one will usher in the end of days.

episodes.name: Rise of the Machines
episodes.overview: We rely on machines for virtually every aspect of modern life. Have we reached the point where we need them more than they need us? If technology goes too far, too fast, there may be a time where we are no longer at the top of the evolutionary food chain.

episodes.name: Stargates
episodes.overview: Scientists believe that Stargates are doorways to wormholes in time. As it turns out, the government may have already known that. We'll reveal the secret location of stargates around the world and tell you who is trying to open them and why.

episodes.name: Remote Viewing
episodes.overview: It was recently reported that the CIA spent over a billion dollars on a "psy ops army". Where did the money go? Was this research a success? We'll unseal documents that could prove the government has an army of remote viewers watching you right now.

episodes.name: Fake World Leaders
episodes.overview: Hitler, Sadaam, Osama. These and many other leaders lived a shadowy life filled with body doubles, assassination attempts and deceit. The trouble is: how do you know when they are really dead? We'll uncover proof that several infamous world leaders did not die when you think they did.

episodes.name: Secret Alien War
episodes.overview: Has our government been at war with alien aggressors for the past half century? Startling evidence indicates that the US military has been under and attack and has kept it from the public.

episodes.name: Time Travel
episodes.overview: Often thought to be safely in the realm of science fiction, time travel is much more real than you were led to believe. We'll unseal the evidence on time travel and let you decide for yourself if time travel is in our future, or our past.

episodes.name: Nazis Today
episodes.overview: Evidence suggests that Adolf Hitler did not commit suicide in a bunker and Nazi leaders were not rounded up and tried at Nuremberg.

episodes.name: Secret Alien Attack
episodes.overview: Examining whether world governments are prepared for an alien attack or not.

episodes.name: Secret Societies
episodes.overview: Examining whether an elite group of power players are plotting the world's fate.

episodes.name: Secret Government Warehouses
episodes.overview: Fort Knox; Hangar 18; Camp Hero; a new, high-security national database center are examined.

episodes.name: Global Depopulation
episodes.overview: A look at the idea of a cataclysmic event that might doom the entirety of civilization as we know it and how we may prepare.

episodes.name: America's Flying Saucer
episodes.overview: America's new killer aircraft; out-of-this-world technology the U.S. military uses to conquer the globe.
